-- 1. 查询 transactions 表（原有逻辑） SELECT id, nft_id, from_address, to_address, transaction_hash, price, currency, transaction_date, purchase_request_id, instance_id, CASE WHEN to_address = #{walletAddress} THEN 'PURCHASE' WHEN from_address = #{walletAddress} THEN 'SALE' END as type FROM transactions WHERE from_address = #{walletAddress} OR to_address = #{walletAddress}
UNION ALL
-- 2. 查询 purchase_requests 表（仅显示未完成的求购） SELECT pr.id, pr.nft_id, pr.buyer_address AS from_address, '' AS to_address, '' AS transaction_hash, pr.price, pr.currency, pr.created_at AS transaction_date, NULL AS purchase_request_id, pr.instance_id, CASE WHEN pr.status = 'requesting' THEN 'PURCHASE_REQUEST' -- 求购中 WHEN pr.status = 'canceled' THEN 'PURCHASE_REFUND' -- 求购取消 -- 不再处理 completed，避免重复 END as type FROM purchase_requests pr WHERE pr.buyer_address = #{walletAddress} AND (pr.status = 'requesting' OR pr.status = 'canceled') -- 不查询 completed
ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
